summary: Most Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block declined on Wednesday, as Core Scientific filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Stocks tumble as Core Scientific files for bankruptcy
content: Most Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block declined on Wednesday, as Core Scientific filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection.
Bitcoin was up and trading a bit under $16,800 by market close, according to data from TradingView.
BTCUSD Chart by TradingView
